attributes.action: Introduce traffic control measures, including road pricing, to reduce congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about recognising that the roads cannot continue to cope with ever increasing amounts of traffic.  Our lives are blighted by air & noise pollution and our streets are no- go areas because of traffic volume & speed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
